phrases: It is been getting pretty hot lately, has not it?
Never mind summer, we have not even had the rainy season yet...
Did you come up with another crazy idea?
Kengo, what you need is a free spirit.
A taut string can easily be cut by one swing of a blade.
However, cutting a loose string that sways with the wind is next to impossible.
What are you trying to say?
I have thought of a lighthearted activity to pass the time.
What do you have in mind?
It is not the season for that...
No one's going to kill you...
Actually, you do get killed in one ghost story I have heard.
If you knock two doors to the right of the second floor girls' bathroom at night, you will hear a voice...
Would you like to wear a red gown?
Would you like to wear a blue gown?
Would you like to wear a yellow gown?
you will be covered in your own blood!
your blood'll be gone and your body blue!
You will be forced to eat so many bananas, your body will turn yellow!
Sign: First-Ever Little Busters Test of Courage: See, There Are not No Ghosts
The First-Ever Little Busters Test of Courage: See, There Are not No Ghosts!
What is a test of courage?
Well Kuu-chan, it is that thing...
You take a pen and stab it between your fingers!
I have hidden talismans on each floor of the building.
It is like a real test!
We will start by picking teams.
Me and Riki got split up!
Alright, first will be Rin's team.
I am not scared... I am not scared...
There is nothing to be scared of with Belka and Strelka around!
Now then, let us go, Takumi no Kami!
Maybe the Disciplinary Committee trained them not to come into the building?
Unlike the dogs, they are not trained!
As long as you are with me, I will not be scared.
And since I am not scared, you two will not be scared, right?
It is about time for the next team to go.
Hey Riki, why do not you come with us?
That would make me feel like an alien being taken to the authorities...
We do not know what my stupid brother might have set up.
I am sure it will be okay!
That hiiya scream just now kind of sounded like fear!
Sounds like one of them's down for the count.
The first talisman is in Kyousuke's classroom.
I knew this way would be
Are you disappointed we are not screaming and jumping into your arms?
What is with this cursed melody?
It is an old cassette player.
What is with that piercing glare?
Was not there some story about severed-hand ramen a while back?
Alright, let us fill it with seaweed and lower it so it touches your neck as you pass.
The last one's in the science room.
Boy, you can lead the way from here on.
I think I will just watch you two getting scared out of your wits from behind.
Could not we go a little slower?
You were fine just a second ago.
Well, when I am behind Yui-nee, it is like we could even take on the President!
I get scared like anyone else.
I think it would be better if
We are both girls, and there is plenty to go around.
That is not the problem here...
That is a sexy way to wake her up.
You disappeared on us for this?
I thought it would be more fun to be on the scaring side.
How many talismans did you find?
It is not no ghosts, it is yes ghosts!
Does not look like anything's here.
The number you have dialed is temporarily not available.
This is not something Kyousuke would do.
I made sure to hang a few basins in case anyone tried to escape.
Now this is something you would do.
Think your muscles can beat mine?
The test of courage is cancelled.
We are going to go ghost busting!
It is hard to believe, but we cannot just leave them be.
If I am with Rin-chan, I will be okay!
Can we really stop that thing?
I have called in some help!
Nishizono, how do you catch a ghost?
We have already invoked its wrath.
Spirits and the like tend to be weak against powerful energy sources.
It may try to avoid loud noises and briht lights.
Do not let down your guard.
Why did you fill it with seaweed?!
When I came back from Hokkaido one time, a young eagle followed me back.
I named him Tweety and loved him very much.
We used to play with him!
He did not like me at all.
But we could not keep an eagle as a pet at home.
Though it broke my heart, I sent Tweety back to Hokkaido.
Did he come down here to see you?
Tweety, come visit me again someday.
So it was all Mister Kyousuke's fault.
It is a good thing it was not a ghost.
That was a pretty hot night.
We are the last ones back?
Where the heck were you guys?
We got held up by your trap in the Principal's Office.
What are you looking all pale for?
I did not set any traps there...
You might want to burn it.
Nishizono-san is always looking at the sky with such distant eyes.
Are you going to invite Nishizono to join the Little Busters?
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
Fly high, high into the sky,
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
The sound of the bell echoing,
The sound of the bell echoing,
Those pieces we shared, one each
Those pieces we shared, one each
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
Can we go beyond the stars?
Can we go beyond the stars?
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
You will be able to smile after you cry,
You will be able to smile after you cry,
I said that because I know you can
I said that because I know you can
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
And I will not say good-bye
And I will not say good-bye
You will start walking again one day
You will start walking again one day
See, There Are not No Ghosts
See, There Are not No Ghosts
See, There Are not No Ghosts
